divs: Sighting Detailsin the may my daughter informed me my hunting dogs was going off i went out side &observed light over the field . i then went i to the house & got a gun & my 35mm . i then went back out with her & observed the object .i took pics of it .it then went up & made right angle turn & was gone. i was in viet nam for 2 tours & in law enforcement 20 years &i have never seen any thing like that & it never made sound & it was 300 ft away from me.
Summary: my hunting dogs were going off lights were all over the field by my house a object was in the air appx 300 in the air with no sound
